remarks: Image of a limit under a continuous map.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
statement:
climcn1.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
climcn1.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
climcn1.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. B ) $.
climcn1.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ z e. B ) -> ( F ` z ) e. CC ) $.
climcn1.5 $e |- ( ph -> G ~~> A ) $.
climcn1.6 $e |- ( ph -> H e. W ) $.
climcn1.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. RR+ ) -> E. y e. RR+ A. z e. B ( ( abs ` ( z - A ) ) < y -> ( abs ` ( ( F ` z ) - ( F ` A ) ) ) < x ) ) $.
climcn1.8 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( G ` k ) e. B ) $.
climcn1.9 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( H ` k ) = ( F ` ( G ` k ) ) ) $.
climcn1 $p |- ( ph -> H ~~> ( F ` A ) ) $.
